Study Title: 3 Years of Anastrozole vs. no Treatment as Extended Adjuvant Therapy for Postmenopausal Women With Breast Cancer
Brief Summary: The study assesses the effect of a further 3 years adjuvant treatment with anastrozole vs. an untreated control group after initial 5 years of adjuvant hormone-therapy.
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
